banner.title: Master Class in Puff and Semi-Puff Pastry

expert.title: Who's Leading the Master Class?
expert.subtitle: Let's get acquainted!
expert.description: I'm Yaroslav Semkiv, a baker and confectioner who loves dough in all its forms. In the master class, we'll prepare both classics and modern trends in sweet baking: croissants, danish pastries, flans, palmiers, and much more.
expert.limitedSeats: Limited number of seats, so hurry to book your spot. See you at the master class.

reviews.title: What do they say about him?
testimonials: Excellent training — lots of specifics, no unnecessary information. I'm already planning to introduce new recipes to my bakery.
The best baking training I've participated in — full of practice and inspiration.
The bread I made after the workshop disappeared faster than it could cool down.

book.title: Yaroslav Semkiv's Book — «Fat Thursday»
book.description: Tender dough and 6 unique flavors for donuts. Make your homemade donuts as delicious as those from a bakery!
